description: The main currency of Stumi. Obtained from studying and upon animal graduation. Used to offer scholarships to animals and purchase furniture and library expansions.
Experience points for animals. Obtained from animals studying. Used to grow and level students.

Obtained from new animals enrolling, students leveling (bonus on landmark levels), and students graduating. Used to level the user and decrease the necessity of scholarships animals need (as the User level increases, the chance of animals requiring scholarships and the amount of scholarship money needed decreases)
